  • | PPosInf (Term s (PDataRecord '[]))

Commutativity -> Term s ((PAsData PInteger :--> (PAsData PInteger :--> PAsData PInteger)) :--> (PValue 'Sorted any0 :--> (PValue 'Sorted any1 :--> PValue 'Sorted 'NoGuarantees)))

name: PScriptContext PScriptContext

display_html: newtype PTxInfo (s :: S) = PTxInfo (Term s (PDataRecord '["inputs" ':= PBuiltinList (PAsData PTxInInfo), "referenceInputs" ':= PBuiltinList (PAsData PTxInInfo), "outputs" ':= PBuiltinList (PAsData PTxOut), "fee" ':= PLovelace, "mint" ':= PValue 'Sorted 'NonZero, "txCerts" ':= PBuiltinList (PAsData PTxCert), "wdrl" ':= PMap 'Unsorted PCredential PLovelace, "validRange" ':= PInterval PPosixTime, "signatories" ':= PBuiltinList (PAsData PPubKeyHash), "redeemers" ':= PMap 'Unsorted PScriptPurpose PRedeemer, "data" ':= PMap 'Unsorted PDatumHash PDatum, "id" ':= PTxId, "votes" ':= PMap 'Unsorted PVoter (PMap 'Unsorted PGovernanceActionId PVote), "proposalProcedures" ':= PBuiltinList (PAsData PProposalProcedure), "currentTreasuryAmount" ':= PMaybeData PLovelace, "treasuryDonation" ':= PMaybeData PLovelace]))
name: PTxInfo PTxInfo

display_html:
data PScriptInfo (s :: S)
  • = PMintingScript (Term s (PDataRecord '["_0" ':= PCurrencySymbol]))
  • | PSpendingScript (Term s (PDataRecord '["_0" ':= PTxOutRef, "_1" ':= PMaybeData PDatum]))
  • | PRewardingScript (Term s (PDataRecord '["_0" ':= PCredential]))
  • | PCertifyingScript (Term s (PDataRecord '["_0" ':= PInteger, "_1" ':= PTxCert]))
  • | PVotingScript (Term s (PDataRecord '["_0" ':= PVoter]))
  • | PProposingScript (Term s (PDataRecord '["_0" ':= PInteger, "_1" ':= PProposalProcedure]))
name: PScriptInfo PMintingScript PSpendingScript PRewardingScript PCertifyingScript PVotingScript PProposingScript

display_html:
data PScriptPurpose (s :: S)
  • = PMinting (Term s (PDataRecord '["_0" ':= PCurrencySymbol]))
  • | PSpending (Term s (PDataRecord '["_0" ':= PTxOutRef]))
  • | PRewarding (Term s (PDataRecord '["_0" ':= PCredential]))
  • | PCertifying (Term s (PDataRecord '["_0" ':= PInteger, "_1" ':= PTxCert]))
  • | PVoting (Term s (PDataRecord '["_0" ':= PVoter]))
  • | PProposing (Term s (PDataRecord '["_0" ':= PInteger, "_1" ':= PProposalProcedure]))
name: PScriptPurpose PMinting PSpending PRewarding PCertifying PVoting PProposing

name: PTxOutRef PTxOutRef

display_html: newtype PTxOut (s :: S) = PTxOut (Term s (PDataRecord '["address" ':= PAddress, "value" ':= PValue 'Sorted 'Positive, "datum" ':= POutputDatum, "referenceScript" ':= PMaybeData PScriptHash]))
name: PTxOut PTxOut

display_html: newtype PTxId (s :: S) = PTxId (Term s (PDataNewtype PByteString))
name: PTxId PTxId

display_html: newtype PTxInInfo (s :: S) = PTxInInfo (Term s (PDataRecord '["outRef" ':= PTxOutRef, "resolved" ':= PTxOut]))
name: PTxInInfo PTxInInfo

display_html:
data POutputDatum (s :: S)
  • = PNoOutputDatum (Term s (PDataRecord '[]))
  • | POutputDatumHash (Term s (PDataRecord '["datumHash" ':= PDatumHash]))
  • | POutputDatum (Term s (PDataRecord '["outputDatum" ':= PDatum]))
name: POutputDatum POutputDatum PNoOutputDatum POutputDatumHash

display_html: newtype PInterval (a :: S -> Type) (s :: S) = PInterval (Term s (PDataRecord '["from" ':= PLowerBound a, "to" ':= PUpperBound a]))
name: PInterval PInterval

display_html: newtype PDatum (s :: S) = PDatum (Term s PData)
name: PDatum PDatum

display_html: newtype PRedeemer (s :: S) = PRedeemer (Term s PData)
name: PRedeemer PRedeemer

display_html: newtype PDatumHash (s :: S) = PDatumHash (Term s (PDataNewtype PByteString))
name: PDatumHash PDatumHash

display_html: newtype PRedeemerHash (s :: S) = PRedeemerHash (Term s (PDataNewtype PByteString))
name: PRedeemerHash PRedeemerHash

display_html: newtype PScriptHash (s :: S) = PScriptHash (Term s (PDataNewtype PByteString))
name: PScriptHash PScriptHash

display_html: newtype PAddress (s :: S) = PAddress (Term s (PDataRecord '["credential" ':= PCredential, "stakingCredential" ':= PMaybeData PStakingCredential]))
name: PAddress PAddress

display_html: newtype PTxId (s :: S) = PTxId (Term s (PDataRecord '["_0" ':= PByteString]))
name: PTxId PTxId

display_html: newtype PTxOut (s :: S) = PTxOut (Term s (PDataRecord '["address" ':= PAddress, "value" ':= PValue 'Sorted 'Positive, "datumHash" ':= PDatumHash]))
name: PTxOut PTxOut

display_html: newtype PTxInInfo (s :: S) = PTxInInfo (Term s (PDataRecord '["outRef" ':= PTxOutRef, "resolved" ':= PTxOut]))
name: PTxInInfo PTxInInfo

display_html: newtype PTxOutRef (s :: S) = PTxOutRef (Term s (PDataRecord '["id" ':= PTxId, "idx" ':= PInteger]))
name: PTxOutRef PTxOutRef

display_html: newtype PPubKeyHash (s :: S) = PPubKeyHash (Term s (PDataNewtype PByteString))
name: PPubKeyHash PPubKeyHash

display_html: newtype PTxInfo (s :: S) = PTxInfo (Term s (PDataRecord '["inputs" ':= PBuiltinList (PAsData PTxInInfo), "outputs" ':= PBuiltinList (PAsData PTxOut), "fee" ':= PValue 'Sorted 'Positive, "mint" ':= PValue 'Sorted 'NoGuarantees, "dCert" ':= PBuiltinList (PAsData PDCert), "wdrl" ':= PBuiltinList (PAsData (PBuiltinPair (PAsData PStakingCredential) (PAsData PInteger))), "validRange" ':= PInterval PPosixTime, "signatories" ':= PBuiltinList (PAsData PPubKeyHash), "data" ':= PBuiltinList (PAsData (PBuiltinPair (PAsData PDatumHash) (PAsData PDatum))), "id" ':= PTxId]))
name: PTxInfo PTxInfo

display_html: newtype PMap (keysort :: KeyGuarantees) (k :: PType) (v :: PType) (s :: S) = PMap (Term s (PBuiltinList (PBuiltinPair (PAsData k) (PAsData v))))
name: PMap PMap

display_html:
data KeyGuarantees
  • = Sorted
  • | Unsorted
name: KeyGuarantees Sorted Unsorted

display_html:
data Commutativity
  • = Commutative
  • | NonCommutative
name: Commutativity Commutative NonCommutative

display_html:
data PMaybeData (a :: S -> Type) (s :: S)
  • = PDJust (Term s (PAsData a))
  • | PDNothing
name: PMaybeData PDJust PDNothing

display_html: newtype PRationalData s = PRationalData (Term s (PDataRecord '["numerator" ':= PInteger, "denominator" ':= PPositive]))
name: PRationalData PRationalData

display_html: pfromDJust :: forall (a :: PType) (s :: S). PIsData a => Term s (PMaybeData a :--> a)
name: pfromDJust

display_html: pisDJust :: forall (a :: PType) (s :: S). Term s (PMaybeData a :--> PBool)
name: pisDJust

display_html: pmaybeData :: forall (a :: PType) (b :: PType) (s :: S). PIsData a => Term s (b :--> ((a :--> b) :--> (PMaybeData a :--> b)))
name: pmaybeData

display_html: pdjust :: forall (a :: PType) (s :: S). PIsData a => Term s (a :--> PMaybeData a)
name: pdjust

display_html: pdnothing :: forall (a :: PType) (s :: S). Term s (PMaybeData a)
name: pdnothing

display_html: pmaybeToMaybeData :: forall (a :: PType) (s :: S). PIsData a => Term s (PMaybe a :--> PMaybeData a)
name: pmaybeToMaybeData

display_html: passertPDJust :: forall (a :: PType) (s :: S). PIsData a => Term s (PString :--> (PMaybeData a :--> a))
name: passertPDJust

display_html: prationalFromData :: ClosedTerm (PRationalData :--> PRational)
name: prationalFromData
